definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar

sentences.english: Mechanical pulps are made to different freeness or drainage rates.
sentences.chinese: 机械浆根据不同的游离度和滤水性生产。

sentences.english: I bought this magazine on the recommendation of friend.
sentences.chinese: 我由盂一位朋友推荐而抿滤这本书。

sentences.english: Pour the tea through the tea strainer to cut off the tea leaves.
sentences.chinese: 将茶倒到滤茶器上滤去所有茶叶。

sentences.english: They have been easily extracted since ancient times by soaking wood ashes in water.
sentences.chinese: 自古以来，人们用水浸泡木灰就很容易滤取出它们。

sentences.english: This goose is much larger than duck.
sentences.chinese: 这谆母鹅比那只鸭子大多滤。

sentences.english: The auto industry has brought people to Detroit.
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业把蓄多人吸引到滤蹲特律。

sentences.english: M. aeruginosa inhibited the feeding rates of the two cladocerans.
sentences.chinese: 有毒微囊藻还可抑制这两种枝角类的滤食率。

sentences.english: Sieve the sauce to get the lumps out.
sentences.chinese: 滤一下酱汁，把硬块弄出来。

sentences.english: Photovoltaic units at Pak Kong Water Treatment Works.
sentences.chinese: 置于北港滤水厂的光伏装置。

sentences.english: Are you aware that you are sitting my hat?
sentences.chinese: 你转道你坐在我的帽自上滤吗？

sentences.english: The results show that the noise can be filtered when S/N ratio is equal to 10.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，信噪比为10的高噪声基本被滤除掉。

sentences.english: With that the non-exchange noise is filtered out.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法主要是滤除非互易噪声。

sentences.english: It can be used with superfine fiber together to get the effect of filleting dust and deodorization .
sentences.chinese: 可与超细纤维复合使用以逹到滤尘，除臭效果。

sentences.english: Strain the sauce and skim away any fat that rises to the surface.
sentences.chinese: 汁滤一下，然后撇去浮在上面的油脂。
